author: Scott Collura
description: Weapons, director Zach Cregger’s follow-up to his 2022 horror film Barbarian, has arrived. But are there any post-credits scenes?
title: Weapons Movie: Post-Credits Check-In (No Spoilers)

author: Mitchell Saltzman
description: At Evo 2025, we got to speak with Lead Champion Designer Alex Jaffe to chat all about the latest addition to the 2XKO roster, Vi. We also touched upon some of the changes coming to the upcoming closed beta and the current renaissance of the tag fighting genre.
title: 2XKO Lead Champion Designer Talks Vi and the Changes Coming in the Closed Beta | Evo 2025

author: Eric Song
description: This is a great 1080p gaming rig with current generation components.
title: The New 2025 Lenovo Legion RTX 5060 Gaming PC Drops Below $1,000 for the First Time

author: Eric Song
description: It's finally at the price it should have been in the first place.
title: The PNY Geforce RTX 5080 Graphics Card Is Available at MSRP from Best Buy, But You Better Hurry

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Love Elden Ring Nightreign, but getting a little bored of the same three-night cycle of bosses and repetitive Everdark sovereigns? Fret not, Nightfarer, because there may be a brand new, extra-hard game mode on the way that will shake up Nightreign's regular playstyle.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Dataminers Say They've Uncovered an Entirely New, Ultra-Hard Game Mode

author: Jacqueline Thomas
description: Whether you're heading to high school, college or any other level of education, the best Chromebooks for students will help you succeed.
title: Best Chromebooks for Students in 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The official Forza Motorsport account has issued a statement to the community regarding the ongoing support for both Motorsport and Forza Horizon 5, saying that developers Turn 10 and Playground Games will "continue to support" their existing titles.
title: Forza Developer Reassures Fans That Motorsport, Horizon 5 Will Continue to Receive Support After Staff Cuts

author: Mitchell Saltzman
description: Ninja Gaiden 4 is everything we've ever wanted a modern Ninja Gaiden game to be. Team Ninja and Platinum Games understood the assignment and seem to be delivering a modern classic.
title: Ninja Gaiden 4 - The Final Preview

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Hideo Kojima's Xbox game project, OD, is still in development, despite Xbox's recent cancellations of a number of projects both internal and external.
title: Kojima's OD 'Still in Development' Despite Xbox Game Cancellations

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: IGN interviewed Take-Two boss Strauss Zelnick on the troubled BioShock 4. Will it actually come out? Here's his response.
title: BioShock 4 Is 'Going to Come Out,' Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick Promises: 'That I Can Say Hand on Heart, Without Question'

author: Eric Song
description: $50 less than the best deal I saw during Amazon Prime Day.
title: The New 2025 Apple iPad Air with M3 Chip Drops to an All-Time Low on Amazon for Back to School

author: Chris Reed
description: These board games are set in real historical periods, giving you an idea of how wars were fought or how people lived.
title: 12 Historical Board Games That Take You Back in Time

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Just in time for spooky season.
title: LEGO Reveals Two New Wednesday Sets Arriving in October, One Month After Part 2 Releases

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Hot Toys' latest Joker figure serves as a terrifying yet stunning recreation of the iconic cover to Batman: The Killing Joke.
title: This Stunning Hot Toys Figure Recreates DC's Most Iconic Joker Cover

author: Eric Song
description: These are the latest models (some released earlier this year) with the M4 chip.
title: Don't Miss Out on the Best Apple MacBook Deals Starting at Just $799 During the Back to School Sale

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Xbox has stopped development of Contrabrand to "evaluate the project's future," with a Bloomberg report saying the game is canceled entirely four years after its initial E3 announcement.
title: Xbox Stops Development on Contraband, Four Years After Initial E3 Announcement

author: Jacqueline Thomas
description: Tips on getting refurbished Apple gear from a longtime cheapskate.
title: How to Get Used or Refurbished Apple Gear Like a Pro

author: jon Burgess
description: So far the changes to this year's game are pretty impressive.
title: Madden NFL 26 Review in Progress

author: Michael Peyton
description: Series Executive Producer and Co-creator Greg Daniels explains how Bobby was "the most important and the most difficult" character to revisit and details what DNA the show shares with The Office.
title: King of the Hill: Exclusive Look at the “Most Difficult” Character to Age Up

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Elden Ring Nightreign has been out for over two months now, which means players have had ample time to puzzle over and tease out every morsel of its lore. But there's still one ultra-rare item in the game that most players have probably never seen before, but which some believe still holds an enormous secret: the Cord End.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Has an Ultra-Rare Item You've Probably Never Seen, and Players Still Are Puzzling Over What It's Really For

author: Michael Peyton
description: Saga Press will release the deluxe print edition of Bobiverse Book #2 For We Are Many January 20, 2026. The entire series has been optioned by Phil Lord and Christopher Miller
title: Bobiverse Book 2: For We Are Many Special Edition Cover Art Revealed - Exclusive

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: With the Battlefield 6 open beta available to play via early access, hundreds of thousands of fans are already facing off against other players (and enormous queues). But what about bots? DICE has offered clarification.
title: Battlefield 6 Dev Clarifies Use of Bots in the Open Beta, Insists They’re Only in the Training Grounds Playlists

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: The Naked Gun (2025) is officially up for preorder on 4K and Blu-ray at various retailers. Its release date is still to be determined.
title: Preorders for The Naked Gun on 4K and Blu-Ray Are Now Available

author: Tom Phillips
description: A release date for the ROG Xbox Ally — essentially, a third-party portable Xbox — has popped up online, suggesting there's only two months to go until the Steam Deck-like handheld will be available to play.
title: Retail Leak Reveals ROG Xbox Ally Handheld Release Date

author: Tom Phillips
description: Marshall Mathers III is no stranger to other names. You probably know him as Eminem, or Slim Shady, or as the latter half of hip-hop super duo Bad Meet Evil. Or, perhaps if you're a little younger, you might know him as... 'The Guy From Fortnite'.
title: Eminem Doesn't Seem to Mind When People Call Him 'The Guy From Fortnite'

author: Michael Cripe
description: Peacock has released a trailer for The Paper, a comedy series about a dying Midwestern newspaper in the same universe as The Office, ahead of its September 4 release date.
title: The Paper Trailer Returns to The Office Universe With First Look at the Toledo Truth Teller

author: Chris Reed
description: If for some reason you still want to buy a Switch OLED, you can save $100 at Walmart right now. It might be your last chance to save.
title: Nintendo Switch OLED Is Somehow $100 Off at Walmart After Price Increases

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum has a “great” script, Warner Bros. CEO David Zaslav has said.
title: The Next Lord of the Rings Movie Has a 'Great' Script, Warner Bros. CEO David Zaslav Says, With Shooting Set for Next Year

author: Ryan McCaffrey
title: Disciples: Domination Announced for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S

author: owenhoke
description: Review: As Netflix’s Wednesday Season 2, Part 1 debuts, the Addams Family-based series continues to feel like an example of untapped potential.
title: Wednesday Season 2, Part 1 Review

author: Michael Cripe
description: The August 2025 Nintendo Indie World Showcase has come to a close, and we've got all of the highlights for you right here.
title: Nintendo Indie World Showcase August 2025: Everything Announced

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Batman 2 starring Robert Pattinson finally begins shooting in spring 2026, Warner Bros. has confirmed, while committing to a 2027 release.
title: The Batman 2 Finally Begins Shooting Spring 2026 — 4 Years After Robert Pattinson's The Batman Hit Theaters

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Following the launch of Superman, DC Universe steward James Gunn is now writing and preparing to direct the next chapter in the ‘Super Family,’ Warner Bros. has announced.
title: Following Superman, Warner Bros. Announces James Gunn Is Now Writing and Set to Direct the ‘Next Chapter in the Super Family’

author: Christian Wait
description: LEGO’s Retro Game Boy and Spider-Verse Minifigs are still up for preorder, along with two limited-edition Charlie Brown Christmas vinyls. Plus, score a 100W Baseus charger for $49.99 and more deals.
title: Here's The Best Deals Today: Charlie Brown Vinyl Preorders, LEGO Spider-Man Minifigs, MTG Amazon Discounts, and More

author: Luke Reilly
description: Mafia: The Old Country is a conventional but effective return to the linear and tightly story-driven format of the original Mafia and Mafia II, and it boasts a wonderful eye and ear for detail.
title: Mafia: The Old Country Review

author: Tom Phillips
description: Sony has reflected on its progress transforming PlayStation into a company that runs a suite of successful live-service games — something that has, so far, returned mixed results.
title: After Concord's Failure and Marathon's Delay, Sony Admits PlayStation's Live-Service Strategy Is 'Not Entirely Going Smoothly'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Hollywood director James Cameron has once again issued a warning about AI gaining control over weapons systems, pointing to the potential for a “Terminator-style apocalypse.”
title: James Cameron Is Once Again Warning Against Letting AI Control Weapons Systems: 'There's Still a Danger of a Terminator-Style Apocalypse'

author: Arnold T. Blumberg
description: Wednesday Season 2 continues to completely misunderstand the Addams Family source material.
title: Netflix's Wednesday Continues to Completely Misunderstand the Source Material in Season 2

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: South Park Season 27 episode Got a Nut aired on Comedy Central last night, and as expected it doubled down on Trump political satire.
title: South Park Season 27 Episode 'Got a Nut' Takes Aim at Trump's Mar-a-Lago Estate, JD Vance, and Kristi Noem

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Battlefield 6 developer DICE has said it’s working on a "substantial" increase in server capacity for the Battlefield 6 Open Beta, after the early access launch was met with huge Steam concurrents and equally huge queues.
title: Battlefield 6 Devs Working on 'Substantial' Increase in Server Capacity as Open Beta Launches to Huge Concurrents and Equally Huge Queues

author: Tom Phillips
description: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is getting the dinosaur-infested islands from the Jurassic Park and Jurassic World movies. You'll be able to zoom overhead among pterosaurs, and ferry guests back and forth between Isla Nublar and the mainland.
title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 Getting Jurassic World Islands

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: If you’re trying to play the Battlefield 6 Open Beta on PC, you might have run into a problem: ‘Secure Boot is not enabled.’ You're not alone.
title: Battlefield 6 Open Beta Forces PC Gamers to Mess About With Their BIOS to Enable Secure Boot — and Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Is Next

author: Tom Phillips
description: Sony has announced a new PlayStation 5 sales milestone of 80.3 million units shipped worldwide, as part of its latest financial results.
title: PlayStation 5 Hits Fresh Sales Milestone, Sony Confirms

author: Adam Mathew
description: Whether you’re itching for some nostalgia, crave chaotic co-op, or feel like diving into lore-rich epics, there’s something irresistible across all four platforms today.
title: AU Deals: From 976 Bucks Off Mega Bundles to Best Preorder Prices, These Deals Cut Deep Across All Platforms

author: Eric Song
description: The Radeon RX 9070 XT graphics card scored a 10/10 in our review.
title: The iBuypower Radeon RX 9070 XT Gaming PC Is Still the Best Gaming PC You Can Get for Under $1,500
